entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
